get.summary: Performs a custom action on an Recurringinvoice
get.description:
Performs a custom action on an invoice.

The current range of actions are as follows
>- clone_to_invoice
>- clone_to_quote
>- history
>- delivery_note
>- mark_paid
>- download
>- archive
>- delete
>- email

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action string to be performed

vat_number.description: The Company Tax Reference ID VAT/ABN/ACN etc

size_id.description: References the size of the company - settings

industry_id.description: References the industry id of the company

first_day_of_week.description: References the start day of the week

financial_year_start.description: The start date of the financial year for the company

payment_terms.description: The company level default payments terms

custom_label1.example: A custom label for a custom value - 1

custom_value1.example: A custom value for a custom label - 1

custom_label2.example: A custom label for a custom value - 2

custom_value2.example: A custom value for a custom label - 2

custom_label3.example: A custom label for a custom value - 3

custom_value3.example: A custom value for a custom label - 3

custom_label4.example: A custom label for a custom value - 4

custom_value4.example: A custom value for a custom label - 4

custom_client_label1.example: A custom value for a custom client label - 1

custom_client_label2.example: A custom value for a custom client label - 2

custom_client_label3.example: A custom value for a custom client label - 3

custom_client_label4.example: A custom value for a custom client label - 4

custom_client_contact_label1.example: A custom value for a custom client contact label - 1

custom_client_contact_label2.example: A custom value for a custom client contact label - 2

custom_client_contact_label3.example: A custom value for a custom client contact label - 3

custom_client_contact_label4.example: A custom value for a custom client contact label - 4

custom_invoice_label1.example: A custom value for a custom invoice label - 1

custom_invoice_label2.example: A custom value for a custom invoice label - 2

custom_invoice_label3.example: A custom value for a custom invoice label - 3

custom_invoice_label4.example: A custom value for a custom invoice label - 4

custom_product_label1.example: A custom value for a custom product label - 1

custom_product_label2.example: A custom value for a custom product label - 2

custom_product_label3.example: A custom value for a custom product label - 3

custom_product_label4.example: A custom value for a custom product label - 4

custom_task_label1.example: A custom value for a custom task label - 1

custom_task_label2.example: A custom value for a custom task label - 2

custom_task_label3.example: A custom value for a custom task label - 3

custom_task_label4.example: A custom value for a custom task label - 4

custom_expense_label1.example: A custom value for a custom expense label - 1

custom_expense_label2.example: A custom value for a custom expense label - 2

custom_expense_label3.example: A custom value for a custom expense label - 3

custom_expense_label4.example: A custom value for a custom expense label - 4

custom_taxes1.description: Determines whether custom fields are also taxed

custom_taxes2.description: Determines whether custom fields are also taxed

default_task_rate.description: The company level default task rate

show_tasks_in_portal.description: Flag for showing tasks in the client portal

custom_message_dashboard.description: Pins a permanent message to the dashboard

custom_message_unpaid_invoice.description: Pins a permanent message to a unpaid invoice

custom_message_paid_invoice.description: Pins a permanent message to a paid invoice

custom_message_unapproved_quote.description: Pins a permanent message to a quote

lock_sent_invoices.description: Prevents an invoice from modification after it has been sent / marked sent

auto_archive_invoice.description: Flag for automatically archiving an invoice on successful payment

inclusive_taxes.description: Flag for the use of inclusive taxes, TRUE = inclusive, FALSE = exclusive

translations.description: Allows a user to override the default translation to use their own specific translations

invoice_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the invoice number

invoice_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the invoice number pattern

quote_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the quote number

quote_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the quote number pattern

client_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the client number

client_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the client number pattern

credit_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the credit number

credit_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the credit number pattern

shared_invoice_quote_counter.description: Flags whether to share the counter for invoices and quotes

recurring_invoice_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the recurring invoice number

reset_counter_frequency_id.description: CONSTANT which is used to apply the frequency which the counters are reset

reset_counter_date.description: The explicit date which is used to reset counters

counter_padding.description: Pads the counter with leading zeros

default_gateway.description: The company level payment gateway to be used

entity.description: The entity which these settings apply - allows generic handling

per_page.description: Used for the default number of items to be displayed in list views

is_owner.description: Determines whether the user owns this company

is_locked.description: Determines whether the users access to this company has been locked

updated_at.description: The last time the record was modified

deleted_at.description: When the record was soft deleted

private_notes.example: The client is in arrears significantly. Stop supply

accepted_credit_cards.description: Bitmask of the account gateway creditcards array

update_details.description: Updates the client with the user and/or gateway input

terms.example: This invoice is payable in 5 days. Strictly cash only.

public_notes.example: These are notes that the client can also see on their invoice

private_notes.example: These are notes that are NOT visible to the client

footer.example: The footer text which is place at the bottom of the invoice

password.description: The user password must meet minimum criteria ~ >6 characters

include.name: include
include.description: Includes child relationships in the response, format is comma separated

index.name: index
index.description: replaces the default response index from data to a user specific string

x_requested_with.name: X-Requested-With
x_requested_with.description: Used to send the XMLHttpRequest header

x_api_secret.name: X-API-SECRET
x_api_secret.description: The API secret as defined by the .env variable API_SECRET

x_api_token.name: X-API-TOKEN
x_api_token.description: The API token to be used for authentication
